data.name: Hot Mulled Cider
instructions: Slowly bring to a boil
Cover & simmer for 20 minutes
Remove spices

data.name: Cranberry Tea
instructions: Mix 1 quart of water with the sugar, red hots, and cloves
Bring to a boil and cook until sugar and red hots have dissolved
Strain and combine with cranberry juice
When ready to serve, add the rest of water, and the juice from the oranges and lemons
Serve Hot or Cold

data.name: Hot Cocoa Mix
instructions: Use 1/3 cup cocoa mix in 1 cup hot water

data.name: Cindy Smith's Punch
instructions: Mix all ingredients together

data.name: 7-Up Punch
instructions: Chill fruits ahead of time
Combine fruit in punch bowl
Stir in pineapple juice and grenadine
Pour in 7-UP slowly and mix gently
Add ice cubes

data.name: Slush Sparkle
instructions: Heat the water and sugar until dissolved
Add the juice and bananas
Pour into containers and freeze
Stir occasionally while freezing
Serve with 7-UP over top

data.name: Tomato Cocktail
instructions: Chill, serve and enjoy

data.name: Fruit Smoothies
ingredients: 1 cup of your favorite fruit (frozen, fresh or canned... we like pineapple, mango and blueberries)
instructions: Put all ingredients into blender and process until smooth

data.name: White Grape Punch
ingredients: 2 liter bottle of dry ginger ale
Fresh pineapple cubes and seedless green grapes to garnish
instructions: Mix all ingredients together

data.name: Summertime Slush
instructions: Combine and freeze 5-6 for slush
It will not freeze solid Keeps well in freezer
Use Dixie cups for individual servings

data.name: Chai Tea
ingredients: 5/8 cup French vanilla non-dairy creamer, dry
instructions: Combine all ingredients and mix well
Store in an airtight container
Yields 4 1/4 cups mix
To prepare: Add 3 rounded teaspoons in cup with boiling water
Note: 5/8 cup = 1/2 cup + 1/8 cup

data.name: Hot Spinach Artichocke Dip
ingredients: 1 jar (6 - 1/2 ounce) marinated artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
1 package (10 ounce) frozen chopped spinach, thawed and well drained
instructions: In a skillet, saute artichokes and onion in butter until onion is tender
Stir in spinach and parmesan cheese
Cook over low heat until spinach is heated through
Add Colby/Monterey Jack cheese, milk, and Creole seasoning
Heat until cheese is melted
Serve immediately with vegetables, tortilla chips, or crackers

data.name: Fresh Fruit Dip
ingredients: 1 - 8 ounce package reduced fat cream cheese - strawberry flavored
1 package strawberry gelatin (can be sugar free)
instructions: Whip together
Refrigerate for a couple of hours
Cut up fruits
Insert toothpicks and dip

data.name: Chestnuts
instructions: Wrap bacon slices around chestnuts with a toothpick
Place on cookie sheet and bake @ 350 degrees for 1 hour
Place in crock pot
Pour sweet and sour sauce over chestnuts and serve warm

data.name: Cheese Ball
instructions: Mix together well, saving 1 cup pecans to roll cheese ball in
Refrigerate at least eight hours before serving

data.name: Little Smokies
instructions: Place in crock pot with enough sauce to cover
Cook on low 5-6 hours

data.name: Reuben Spread
ingredients: 1 pound can sauerkraut, drained and chopped
instructions: Mix well. Cover and bake @ 350 degrees for 30 minutes
Spread on cocktail Rye bread

data.name: Cheese Dreams
ingredients: 6 ounce Old English Sharp Cheese spread
instructions: Cut bread into 2 inch cubes
Whip cheese and butter and frost all sides of bread cubes
Bake at 375 degrees for 10 minutes

data.name: Taco Salad
instructions: Mix cream cheese, cottage cheese and taco seasoning together
Spread thin on 2 pizza pans
Chop up the vegetables
Sprinkle on top of cream cheese mixture
Top with shredded taco cheese
Scoop up with plain Tostados

data.name: Vegetable Dip
instructions: Mix together and chill

data.name: Fruit Dip
instructions: Mix all ingredients together

data.name: Caramel Apple Dip
instructions: Mix all ingredients together
Variation: Omit the caramel flavoring and add chopped peanuts, finely chopped

data.name: Apple Snickers
instructions: Cut up Apples and Snickers bars
Mix all ingredients together

data.name: Nuts And Bolts
instructions: Melt butter
Add worcestershire sauce, garlic and onion
Combine cereals, pretzels and nuts
Pour butter over ceareal mixture and stir well
Use a large turkey roaster with a cover
Put in oven for 1 hour
Bake at 250 degrees
Stir often

data.name: Joni's Wedding Chex Mix
instructions: Mix all ingredients together

data.name: Spinach Dip in a Bread Bowl
ingredients: 1 envelope (1 ounce) Ranch Salad Dressing Mix
1 - 10 ounce package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and well drained
instructions: Combine first 6 ingredients and chill for at least an hour
Cut top off (1 1/2 inch) of loaf of bread
Hollow out loaf, leaving a thick shell
Save bread for dipping as well as raw vegetables

data.name: Chicken Pillows
instructions: Cut chicken 1 inch cubes
Combine remaining ingredients and add chicken
Marinate covered overnight in refrigerator
Melt butter
Unwrap phyllo and place on wax paper
Cover what you are not working with to prevent it from drying out
Cut Pastry in half with scissors lengthwise, giving you 2 long strips about 6 inches wide
Take one strip of phyllo, fold crosswise and brush with butter
Place 2 pieces of chicken at one short end and roll up in pastry to midpoint
Fold left and right edges toward center over filling and continue rolling; Forming a neat package
Brush entire package with butter and place seam side down on jelly roll pan
Repeat with remaining chicken and phyllo
Bake at 400 degrees for 15 minutes until golden brown
To freeze ahead, Place filled and buttered phyllo rolls on a large baking sheet and freeze
When frozen, transfer to large plastic bag and seal
To bake, Place frozen rolls on single layer on cookie sheet
Crush with butter
Bake at 400 degrees for 20 minutes

data.name: Bar-B-Q Ribs
instructions: Place ribs on roasting pan
Combine other ingredients and pour over ribs
Cover and bake at 325 degrees for 2 1/2 hours
Remove cover and bake an additional 30 minutes

data.name: Taco Casserole
instructions: Brown onion and garlic in oil-add meat for 5 minutes
Drain fat
Stir in tomato sauce and taco seasoning mix
Rinse and drain kidney beans
Mix beans with half of the cheese
Grease 9x13 inch casserole pan
Line bottom with 1/3 chips
Spread a layer of bean and cheese mixture
Add 1/3 chips and spread layer of meat mixture
Add remaining chips
Drizzle taco sauce over top
Add remaining cheese
Bake 25 minutes at 375

data.name: Corn Beef Casserole
instructions: Combine milk and soup
Layer noodles through cheese in order above
Pour milk mixture over top
Bake 35 minutes at 350 degrees
Add bread crumbs and bake an additional 10 minutes

data.name: Frikadellas (Norwegian Meatballs)
ingredients: 2 pounds ground meat (any combination of lean ground beef, pork, turkey)
instructions: Combine first 7 ingredients in a large bowl
Beat smooth
Mix in the ground meats
Blend thoroughly
Heat oil in a skillet
Drop meat mixture by rounded tablespoons into hot skillet
As they brown, flatten into patties (1/2 inch thick 2 inch diameter)
Brown well on both sides
Drain on paper towel
Place in covered casserol
Freeze to reheat later OR place in 350 degree oven in covered casserole dish for 20-30 minutes
additional: Traditional - Serve with lingonberries and sour cream
Our way - brown gravy and mashed potatoes
Also very good with barbeque sauce

data.name: Stuffed Peppers
ingredients: 4 large green peppers (tops cut off and cleaned out)
instructions: Mix together ground beef, rice, egg and sauce in a bowl
Stuff green peppers full with hamburger mixture
Make excess hamburger mixture into large balls and place peppers and balls into 9x13 baking pan
Cover with tomato soup
Bake at 350 degrees for 1 1/2 hours
Serve and enjoy

data.name: Reuben Loaf
instructions: Set aside 1 cup flour
In a large bowl, mix remaining flour, sugar, salt and yeast
Stir in hot water and oleo
Mix in only enough reserved flour to make a soft dough
Knead 4 minutes
On greased baking sheet, roll dough in approximately 14x10 inch rectangle
Spread dressing down center third of dough lengthwise
Top with layers of beef, cheese and sauerkraut
Cut 1 inch wide strips along sides of filling of dough edges
Alternating sides, fold strips at an angle across the filling
Cover and place baking sheet over large shallow pan, half filled with boiling water for 15 minutes
Brush with egg white, sprinkle with sesame seeds
Bake 25 minutes at 400 degrees

data.name: Sloppy Joe
instructions: Saute onions, celery and green pepper
Brown meat
Add all other ingredients and simmer about 2 hours

data.name: Chop Suey Casserole
instructions: Combine, place in greased casserole dish
Bake at 425 for 30 minutes
Sprinkle top with Chinese noodles

data.name: Belly Burner Meat Balls
instructions: Combine and shape into 1 inch meatballs and simmer covered 10 minutes
Stir occasionally

data.name: Hamburger Pie
instructions: Combine flour, shortening and 1/2 tsp salt and place in pie pan
Top with 1/4 cup chopped onion
Brown beef
Add rest of ingredients and pour over crust
Topping #1
Top with 6 fresh tomato slices
Bake at 400 20-25 minutes
Add a slice of cheese on top of each tomato the last minute of baking
Just enough to melt the cheese
Topping #2
Make instant potato for 4 servings
Hold out milk
Add beaten egg
Then add just enough milk to make them right consistency
Place on top of meat filling
Bake at 400 20-25 minutes

data.name: Brown's BBQ Beef Supreme Sloppy Joes
Fettuccine and Chicken in Herb Sauce
Chicken and Vegetable Lasagna - Crock Pot
Aunt Ollie's Butter Scotch Icebox Cookies
Paul and Di's Hand Dipped Creams
